name: Alone In Mars
description:
You are alone in mars and visitors come to your planet, kill all of em as you can BECAUSE THE PLANET IS ALL YOURS!!!

Music: https://soundcloud.com/power-b...

controls:

  • A,D - Left And Right 
  • Space-Jump 
  • Esc-Exit the game

UPDATE v1

  • The game's problem crashing fixed (Credit to Zeoxo for reporting the problem)

UPDATE v2

  • Sound effects added
  • Smoke effect when death occurs added

UPDATE v3

  • Squash and stretch animation added
  • Score display on top of the screen added (Credit to Rhornbeck for the suggestion)

UPDATE v3

  • Online leaderboards coming soon
